title: Darjeeling  A Tourists' Delight
text:
Travel Articles | July 11, 2015 
When you think Darjeeling, the image that your mind conjures up is a picturesque hill station in the lap of lush greeney, with quaint homes dotting the hillside and fantastic climate hand-crafted by God. Darjeeling is all that and more! After all, there is a reason it was a jewel in the British crown during the British raaj era. 
Want to perambulate and soak in the local flavour? Head to Chowrasta, which, as the name suggests is a junction of four roads where tourists and locals congregate to gossip, explore and make the most of their idle time. Have excited kids in tow? Then take them to the Darjeeling zoo which is the largest high altitude zoo in India and boasts of animals unique to the Himalayan area such as red pandas, snow leopards, Tibetian wolves, etc. Looking for adventure in the form of rock climbing and hiking? Then the Himalayan Mountaineering Institue is your one stop shop. Built to commemorate Tenzing Norgay, the sherpa who accompanied Sir Edmund Hillary in his successful and historical conquest of Mount Everest, the institute also houses an indoor activities area and a well-curated museum. Seeking divine blessings and a peaceful state of mind? The Yiga Choeling monastery located close to the Ghoom railway station is perfect for you. Don't forget to turn that prayer wheel in clock-wise direction for good luck! Another unmissable attraction is the Darjeeling ropeway that offers an unforgettable view of the hill and valleys that Darjeeling overlooks. Oh, and make sure you indulge the inner child in you by taking a journey on the famed Darjeeling toy train. The ride alongside the Batasia Loop is especially picturesque and spectacular. 
If these are not enough reasons for you to visit Darjeeling, then the hotels in Darjeeling are a close second. The best hotels in Darjeeling are not just luxurious but also comfortable and focused on the best interests of their guests. Darjeeling hotels share the same ambience as the beautiful hillstation – warm, inviting and usually offer a stunning view. Since it is a location that features on most people's to-visit list, Darjeeling hotel bookings fill up fast. The great thing is, each place comes with its own set of specialities so you have a vast array of services and amenities to choose from. So what are you waiting for? Book a hotel in Darjeeling and make your way over to the Queen of Hill Stations for a vacation of a lifetime!
